title: Understanding Frameworks
text: Frameworks do more than just organize thoughts. Consider how they might aid individuals in a storytelling context.

title: Effectiveness of Frameworks
text: Think about how frameworks might benefit someone who's struggling to find a coherent structure in their narrative. That's a key usage of storytelling frameworks.

title: Beyond Uniformity
text: There's more to frameworks than merely following a standard pattern. Reflect on whether frameworks offer a customized approach or just a one-size-fits-all solution.

title: Target Audience
text: Consider who benefits the most from having a structure in storytelling. Think about the phrase "struggling to put a narrative together."
